>Construction of pCSC4
//Synthetic sucrose promoter driving amilGFP, variant with  P_cscA repressor mutated to A at +1 site, so an exact MED
acquire oligo csc7
acquire oligo csc9
acquire plasmid p20N31
PCR csc7,csc9 on p20N31	(2952bp, fcsc4)
Assemble fcsc4	(BsmBI, pCSC4)
Transform pCSC4	(Mach1, Kan)
---
>csc7
ccataCGTCTCacaccaGGATCCaaataggagaaatac
>csc9
cagtcCGTCTCtggtgaattgttaTcctagcataatacctaggactg
>p20N31
